alhaitham.description: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free â€” free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

artifacts.name: Gilded Dreams (2) + Emblem of Severed Fate (2)

alhaitham.info: Inserisci qui le note, consigli e spiegazioni per Alhaitham.

skills.name: Abductive Reasoning
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Universality: An Elaboration on Form
skills.desc: Truth inherently exists amidst uncertainty. Even the greatest of scholars are not immune to error.
skills.details_html:
Rushes forward, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents when the rush ends, causing a Chisel-Light Mirror to form.
Holding this skill will cause it to behave differently.
Hold
Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the direction of Alhaitham's rush attack.
Chisel-Light Mirror
When this skill is unleashed, Alhaitham will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. If there are no Mirrors at this time, he will generate 1 additional Mirror.
Chisel-Light Mirrors will have the following properties:
  • When he possesses Chisel-Light Mirrors, Alhaitham's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Dendro DMG. This cannot be overridden.
  • When attacks of the aforementioned kind hit opponents, the Chisel-Light Mirrors will unleash a Projection Attack that deals AoE Dendro DMG based on the number of Mirrors on the field.
  • A total of 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors can exist at once.
  • The Chisel-Light Mirrors will disappear one after the other over time, and will all disappear when Alhaitham leaves the field.

skills.name: Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena
skills.desc: If a researcher makes wisdom their goal, then they should be prepared to make an enemy of every word they read. Only then can they avoid bias.

passive_talents.name: Four-Causal Correction
passive_talents.desc: When Alhaitham's Charged or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, they will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.

passive_talents.name: Mysteries Laid Bare
passive_talents.desc: Each point of Alhaitham's Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Projection Attacks and Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 0.1%. The DMG of both aforementioned abilities can be increased by a maximum of 100% this way.

passive_talents.name: Law of Reductive Overdetermination
passive_talents.desc: When Alhaitham crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Intuition
constellations.desc: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, Universality: An Elaboration on Form's CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

constellations.name: Debate
constellations.desc: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

constellations.name: Negation
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Universality: An Elaboration on Form by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elucidation
constellations.desc: When Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around: Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s. Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% Dendro DMG Bonus for 15s. The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

constellations.name: Sagacity
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Structuration
constellations.desc: Alhaitham gains the following effects: 2 seconds after Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed. If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s. If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

baizhu.description: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, Baizhu is a gentle and knowledgeable doctor from Liyue who specializes in Dendro healing arts.
talents: Normal Attack: The Classics of Acupuncture
baizhu.info: Baizhu is a Dendro healer who excels at providing continuous healing and Dendro application for his team.

skills.name: Normal Attack: The Classics of Acupuncture
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a stronger Dendro attack.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Dendro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Universal Diagnosis
skills.desc: Controls a Gossamer Sprite that roams and attacks, healing the active character and dealing Dendro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Universal Diagnosis
Controls a Gossamer Sprite that roams and attacks, healing the active character and dealing Dendro DMG. Healing scales with Baizhu's Max HP.

skills.name: Holistic Revivification
skills.desc: Enters a state where Baizhu creates a Seamless Shield that heals and protects the team, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Holistic Revivification
Enters a state where Baizhu creates a Seamless Shield that heals and protects the team, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby enemies. Healing and shield strength scale with Baizhu's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Five Fortunes Forever
passive_talents.desc: Baizhu gains different effects depending on the HP of the active character.

passive_talents.name: All Things Are of the Earth
passive_talents.desc: After Baizhu uses his Elemental Burst, all party members gain increased Healing Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Herbal Nourishment
passive_talents.desc: When Baizhu is in the party, interacting with certain plants will heal the active character.

constellations.name: Attentive Observation
constellations.desc: Universal Diagnosis gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Incisive Discernment
constellations.desc: When Baizhu's Seamless Shield heals, it also increases the target's Dendro RES.

constellations.name: Encyclopedic Understanding
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Universal Diagnosis by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Attunement
constellations.desc: When a character is healed by Baizhu, they gain increased Elemental Mastery.

constellations.name: Transcendent Wisdom
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Holistic Revivification by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elixir of Immortality
constellations.desc: Baizhu's healing effects are increased when the active character's HP is below 50%.

beidou.description: The Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean, captain of The Crux. Beidou is a powerful Electro claymore user who excels at counterattacks and AoE damage.
beidou.info: Beidou is a versatile Electro DPS/support who excels in counterattacks and provides strong AoE Electro DMG with her Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller
skills.desc: Press: Swings her blade forward, dealing Electro DMG. Hold: Lifts her weapon as a shield. DMG absorbed scales with Beidou's Max HP. Releases the energy as a counterattack, dealing massive Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Tidecaller
Press: Swings her blade forward, dealing Electro DMG.
Hold: Lifts her weapon as a shield. DMG absorbed scales with Max HP. Releases the energy as a counterattack, dealing massive Electro DMG.

skills.name: Stormbreaker
skills.desc: Summons a Thunderbeast's Targe, surrounding Beidou with a lightning shield that deals Electro DMG to nearby enemies and increases resistance to interruption.
skills.details_html:
Stormbreaker
Summons a Thunderbeast's Targe, surrounding Beidou with a lightning shield that deals Electro DMG to nearby enemies and increases resistance to interruption. Attacks under this effect will chain lightning between enemies.

passive_talents.name: Retribution
passive_talents.desc: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment grants maximum DMG bonus.

passive_talents.name: Lightning Storm
passive_talents.desc: After using Tidecaller with maximum stacks, Beidou's ATK SPD is increased by 15% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Conqueror of Tides
passive_talents.desc: Decreases swimming stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.desc: Stormbreaker creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.desc: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Tidecaller by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.desc: Upon being attacked, Beidou's ATK is increased by 30% for 10s.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Stormbreaker by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.desc: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding enemies is decreased by 15%.

bennett.description: A passionate adventurer from Mondstadt and the leader of "Benny's Adventure Team". Bennett is a top-tier support and healer who boosts his team's ATK and provides strong healing.
bennett.info: Bennett is a premier support who provides massive ATK buffs and healing with his Elemental Burst. Build him for Energy Recharge and HP% to maximize his support potential.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Passion Overload
skills.desc: Bennett strikes with a sword imbued with Pyro. Press: Swift single strike. Hold: Charges up for up to 2 additional strikes, each dealing increased Pyro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Passion Overload
Press: Swift single Pyro strike.
Hold: Charges up for up to 2 additional strikes, each dealing increased Pyro DMG. Overcharged attack causes an explosion, launching both Bennett and enemies.

skills.name: Fantastic Voyage
skills.desc: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG and creates an Inspiration Field. If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their HP will continuously regenerate. If their health is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus based on Bennett's Base ATK.
skills.details_html:
Fantastic Voyage
Performs a jumping Pyro attack, creating an Inspiration Field. Characters inside are healed if below 70% HP, or gain an ATK Bonus if above 70%. Healing and ATK Bonus scale with Bennett's stats.

passive_talents.name: Rekindle
passive_talents.desc: Decreases Passion Overload's cooldown by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Fearnaught
passive_talents.desc: Within the Inspiration Field created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload does not cause Bennett to be launched and its cooldown is decreased by 50%.

passive_talents.name: It Should Be Safe...
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.desc: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.desc: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Passion Overload by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.desc: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Fantastic Voyage by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's Inspiration Field gain 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

candace.description: The guardian of Aaru Village, Candace is a Hydro polearm user who provides shields and buffs to her team.
talents: Normal Attack: Gleaming Spear - Guardian Stance
candace.info: Candace is a support who provides Hydro application, shields, and buffs to Normal Attacks of her team. Build her for HP% and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Gleaming Spear - Guardian Stance
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
skills.desc: Candace raises her shield, creating a barrier that absorbs damage based on her Max HP and deals Hydro DMG when released.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
Raises a shield that absorbs damage based on Max HP. When released, deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
skills.desc: Candace unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting the Prayer of the Crimson Crown buff to all nearby characters.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
Unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting the Prayer of the Crimson Crown buff, which increases Normal Attack DMG and infuses attacks with Hydro.

passive_talents.name: To Dawn's First Light
passive_talents.desc: Decreases climbing stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Aegis of Crossed Arrows
passive_talents.desc: Characters affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown deal increased Elemental DMG.

passive_talents.name: Celestial Dome of Sand
passive_talents.desc: Increases the resistance of all party members to interruption while protected by a shield.

constellations.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
constellations.desc: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
constellations.desc: When characters protected by Candace's shield take damage, they gain increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: Hunter's Supplication
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sentinel Oath
constellations.desc: Characters affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown gain increased Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.name: Hallowed Gold of the Desert
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Overflow
constellations.desc: When a character affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown triggers an Elemental Reaction, they gain increased ATK for 8s.

charlotte.description: A renowned reporter from Fontaine, Charlotte is a Cryo catalyst user who excels at healing and providing buffs to her team.
charlotte.info: Charlotte is a Cryo support and healer who provides strong healing and buffs. Build her for HP% and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Press Release
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with her camera, dealing Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with her camera, dealing Cryo DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a focused Cryo shot.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Cryo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostprint Snapshot
skills.desc: Charlotte takes a snapshot, healing all nearby allies and dealing AoE Cryo DMG to enemies.
skills.details_html:
Frostprint Snapshot
Takes a snapshot, healing all nearby allies and dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Healing scales with Charlotte's Max HP.

skills.name: Exclusive Interview
skills.desc: Charlotte conducts an exclusive interview, creating a field that continuously heals allies and deals Cryo DMG to enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Exclusive Interview
Creates a field that continuously heals allies and deals Cryo DMG to enemies inside. Healing scales with Charlotte's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Quick Shutter
passive_talents.desc: After using Frostprint Snapshot, Charlotte's healing effectiveness is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Photo Finish
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Exclusive Interview's field gain increased CRIT Rate.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Finest
passive_talents.desc: When Charlotte is in the party, the chance to obtain double food from cooking is increased by 12%.

constellations.name: Front Page Scoop
constellations.desc: Frostprint Snapshot gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Breaking News
constellations.desc: Allies healed by Charlotte gain increased Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.name: Headline Maker
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Frostprint Snapshot by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exclusive Access
constellations.desc: Allies inside Exclusive Interview's field gain increased Healing Bonus.

constellations.name: Prime Time
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Exclusive Interview by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulitzer Dream
constellations.desc: When an ally is healed by Charlotte, they gain increased ATK for 8s.

chasca.description: A swift and clever archer from Natlan, Chasca uses Anemo powers to control the battlefield and support her allies.
talents: Normal Attack: Gleaming Spear - Guardian Stance
chasca.info: Candace is a support who provides Hydro application, shields, and buffs to Normal Attacks of her team. Build her for HP% and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Gleaming Spear - Guardian Stance
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
skills.desc: Candace raises her shield, creating a barrier that absorbs damage based on her Max HP and deals Hydro DMG when released.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
Raises a shield that absorbs damage based on Max HP. When released, deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
skills.desc: Candace unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting the Prayer of the Crimson Crown buff to all nearby characters.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
Unleashes a wave of Hydro energy, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and granting the Prayer of the Crimson Crown buff, which increases Normal Attack DMG and infuses attacks with Hydro.

passive_talents.name: To Dawn's First Light
passive_talents.desc: Decreases climbing stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Aegis of Crossed Arrows
passive_talents.desc: Characters affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown deal increased Elemental DMG.

passive_talents.name: Celestial Dome of Sand
passive_talents.desc: Increases the resistance of all party members to interruption while protected by a shield.

constellations.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
constellations.desc: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
constellations.desc: When characters protected by Candace's shield take damage, they gain increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: Hunter's Supplication
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sentinel Oath
constellations.desc: Characters affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown gain increased Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.name: Hallowed Gold of the Desert
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Overflow
constellations.desc: When a character affected by Prayer of the Crimson Crown triggers an Elemental Reaction, they gain increased ATK for 8s.

chiori.description: A renowned fashion designer from Fontaine, Chiori uses Geo powers and her sword to create stylish attacks and support her allies.
chiori.info: Chiori is a Geo DPS/sub-DPS who excels at dealing consistent Geo DMG and supporting her team with stylish skills. Build her for DEF%, CRIT, and Geo DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Couture Slash
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Seamstress's Artistry
skills.desc: Chiori creates a Geo construct that deals AoE Geo DMG and increases DEF for all allies inside its field.
skills.details_html:
Seamstress's Artistry
Creates a Geo construct that deals AoE Geo DMG and increases DEF for all allies inside its field. DMG and bonus scale with Chiori's DEF.

skills.name: Runway Finale
skills.desc: Chiori unleashes a stylish Geo attack, dealing massive AoE Geo DMG and granting all allies increased CRIT Rate.
skills.details_html:
Runway Finale
Unleashes a stylish Geo attack, dealing massive AoE Geo DMG and granting all allies increased CRIT Rate. Bonus scales with Chiori's DEF.

passive_talents.name: Fashion Forward
passive_talents.desc: After using Seamstress's Artistry, Chiori's DEF is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Geo Couture
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Runway Finale's field gain increased Geo DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Elegance
passive_talents.desc: When Chiori is in the party, crafting weapon ascension materials has a 10% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

constellations.name: First Stitch
constellations.desc: Seamstress's Artistry gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Pattern Perfection
constellations.desc: Allies inside Seamstress's Artistry field gain increased ATK.

constellations.name: Runway Ready
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Seamstress's Artistry by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fashion Icon
constellations.desc: Allies inside Runway Finale's field gain increased CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Couture Master
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Runway Finale by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grand Finale
constellations.desc: When an ally inside Runway Finale's field scores a CRIT Hit, they gain increased DEF for 8s.

chongyun.description: A young exorcist from Liyue, Chongyun uses his Cryo vision to purify evil spirits and support his allies with powerful AoE Cryo attacks.
chongyun.info: Chongyun is a Cryo claymore user who excels at AoE Cryo application and can serve as both a main DPS and a support for enabling Melt and Freeze reactions.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Demonbane
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.desc: Chongyun strikes the ground with his claymore, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE and creating a Chonghua Frost Field that converts sword, claymore, and polearm attacks to Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Chonghua's Layered Frost
Strikes the ground, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE and creating a Frost Field. Sword, claymore, and polearm-wielding characters within the field will have their attacks converted to Cryo DMG.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.desc: Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall one by one after a short delay, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Cloud-Parting Star
Summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall one by one after a short delay, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to all enemies in their path.

passive_talents.name: Steady Breathing
passive_talents.desc: Sword, claymore, or polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passive_talents.name: Rimechaser Blade
passive_talents.desc: When the field created by Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

passive_talents.name: Gallant Journey
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.desc: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades, each dealing 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in their path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.desc: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.desc: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cryo. This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.desc: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with less than 50% HP.

citlali.description: A swift and resourceful archer from Natlan, Citlali uses Anemo powers to control the battlefield and support her allies with Swirl reactions.
citlali.info: Citlali is an Anemo bow user who excels at grouping enemies and enabling Swirl reactions. She can serve as a support or sub-DPS, boosting her team's Elemental DMG.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Windpiercer
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Anemo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Gale Trap
skills.desc: Citlali sets a wind trap that pulls in enemies and deals AoE Anemo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Gale Trap
Sets a wind trap that pulls in enemies and deals AoE Anemo DMG. Triggers Swirl reactions with elements present in the area.

skills.name: Feathered Cyclone
skills.desc: Citlali fires a cyclone arrow that creates a vortex, dealing continuous Anemo DMG and pulling in enemies.
skills.details_html:
Feathered Cyclone
Fires a cyclone arrow that creates a vortex, dealing continuous Anemo DMG and pulling in enemies. The vortex lasts for a few seconds and triggers Swirl reactions.

passive_talents.name: Swirling Precision
passive_talents.desc: After triggering a Swirl reaction, Citlali's Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Wind's Favor
passive_talents.desc: Allies within the area of Feathered Cyclone gain 20% increased Elemental DMG.

passive_talents.name: Natlan's Grace
passive_talents.desc: When Citlali is in the party, gliding stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: Breeze's Call
constellations.desc: Gale Trap gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Windrider's Agility
constellations.desc: After using Feathered Cyclone, Citlali's Movement SPD is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Cyclone Mastery
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Feathered Cyclone by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Swirl Specialist
constellations.desc: Swirl reactions triggered by Citlali restore 3 Energy to her. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Trap Tactician
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Gale Trap by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Eye of the Storm
constellations.desc: Allies within Feathered Cyclone's area gain 20% increased CRIT Rate.

clorinde.description: A renowned duelist from Fontaine, Clorinde wields her sword with precision and channels Electro energy to overwhelm her foes.
clorinde.info: Clorinde is an Electro sword DPS who excels at single-target damage and quick Electro application. She can trigger powerful reactions and benefits from high CRIT and ATK stats.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Duelist's Edge
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Lightning Riposte
skills.desc: Clorinde dashes forward, dealing Electro DMG and leaving a mark on enemies. Marked enemies take increased damage from her attacks.
skills.details_html:
Lightning Riposte
Dashes forward, dealing Electro DMG and marking enemies. Marked enemies take increased damage from Clorinde's attacks for a short duration.

skills.name: Judgment of the Court
skills.desc: Clorinde unleashes a powerful Electro slash, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and increasing her CRIT Rate for a short time.
skills.details_html:
Judgment of the Court
Unleashes a powerful Electro slash, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and increasing Clorinde's CRIT Rate for a short time.

passive_talents.name: Duelist's Instinct
passive_talents.desc: After using Lightning Riposte, Clorinde's ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Electro Mastery
passive_talents.desc: Judgment of the Court increases all party members' Electro DMG Bonus by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Honor
passive_talents.desc: When Clorinde is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: First Strike
constellations.desc: Lightning Riposte gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Duelist's Finesse
constellations.desc: After using Judgment of the Court, Clorinde's Movement SPD is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Court's Verdict
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Judgment of the Court by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Electro Supremacy
constellations.desc: Electro reactions triggered by Clorinde restore 3 Energy to her. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Riposte Master
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Lightning Riposte by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Duelist's Triumph
constellations.desc: Allies within Judgment of the Court's area gain 20% increased CRIT Rate.

collei.description: A trainee Forest Ranger from Sumeru, Collei uses her Dendro vision and bow to support her allies and trigger powerful reactions.
collei.info: Collei is a Dendro bow user who excels at off-field Dendro application and supporting her team in reaction-based teams. Build her for Energy Recharge and Elemental Mastery.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Supplicant's Bowmanship
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Dendro DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Floral Brush
skills.desc: Collei throws a Floral Ring that deals Dendro DMG to enemies it passes through, both outward and return.
skills.details_html:
Floral Brush
Throws a Floral Ring that deals Dendro DMG to enemies it passes through, both outward and return.

skills.name: Trump-Card Kitty
skills.desc: Collei throws the doll Cuilein-Anbar, creating a zone that deals continuous Dendro DMG to enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Trump-Card Kitty
Throws the doll Cuilein-Anbar, creating a zone that deals continuous Dendro DMG to enemies inside for 6s.

passive_talents.name: Floral Sidewinder
passive_talents.desc: If one of your party members has triggered Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions before the Floral Ring returns, it grants the character the Sprout effect, dealing Dendro DMG based on 40% of Collei's ATK for 3s.

passive_talents.name: The Languid Wood
passive_talents.desc: Characters who are within the zone created by Trump-Card Kitty gain 60 Elemental Mastery after triggering a Dendro reaction.

passive_talents.name: Gliding Champion of Sumeru
passive_talents.desc: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Deepwood Patrol
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Through Hill and Copse
constellations.desc: The Passive Talent Floral Sidewinder is changed: The Sprout effect can be triggered by the entire party, not just the character who triggered the reaction.

constellations.name: Scent of Summer
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Floral Brush by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Gift of the Woods
constellations.desc: Using Trump-Card Kitty increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s.

constellations.name: All Embers
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Trump-Card Kitty by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forest of Falling Arrows
constellations.desc: When the Floral Ring hits, it creates a miniature zone that deals 40% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG to nearby enemies for 3s.

cyno.description: The General Mahamatra of the Akademiya, Cyno is a relentless Electro polearm user who excels at sustained on-field DPS and quick Electro reactions.
cyno.info: Cyno is an Electro polearm DPS who excels at sustained on-field damage during his Burst. Build him for CRIT, Elemental Mastery, and Electro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Invoker's Spear
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
skills.desc: Cyno performs a swift thrust, dealing Electro DMG. If used during his Burst, triggers a Duststalker Bolt that deals AoE Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
Performs a swift thrust, dealing Electro DMG. If used during Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness, triggers a Duststalker Bolt that deals AoE Electro DMG.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
skills.desc: Cyno calls upon a divine spirit, entering the Pactsworn Pathclearer state, increasing his abilities and converting his attacks to Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
Enters the Pactsworn Pathclearer state, increasing Cyno's abilities and converting his attacks to Electro DMG. In this state, using his Elemental Skill triggers Duststalker Bolts.

passive_talents.name: Featherfall Judgment
passive_talents.desc: When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Authority Over the Nine Bows
passive_talents.desc: Duststalker Bolts triggered by Cyno's Elemental Skill deal 35% more DMG.

passive_talents.name: The Gift of Silence
passive_talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition.

constellations.name: Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil
constellations.desc: After using Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness, Cyno's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 20% for 10s.

constellations.name: Ceremony: Homecoming of Spirits
constellations.desc: When Cyno's Normal Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, he regenerates 3 Energy. Can occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Precept: Lawful Enforcer
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Austerity: Forbidding Guard
constellations.desc: When Cyno triggers an Electro reaction, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

constellations.name: Funerary Rite: The Passing of Starlight
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Raiment: Just Scales
constellations.desc: When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state, his Electro DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.

dahlia.description: A brilliant Hydro catalyst user from Fontaine, Dahlia excels at healing and supporting her allies with powerful Hydro abilities.
dahlia.info: Dahlia is a Hydro catalyst support and healer who provides strong healing and buffs. Build her for HP%, Healing Bonus, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dewdrop Arc
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive Hydro attacks.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive Hydro attacks.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a focused Hydro blast.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Aqua Restoration
skills.desc: Dahlia creates a healing rain that restores HP to all nearby allies and deals AoE Hydro DMG to enemies.
skills.details_html:
Aqua Restoration
Creates a healing rain that restores HP to all nearby allies and deals AoE Hydro DMG. Healing scales with Dahlia's Max HP.

skills.name: Tide of Renewal
skills.desc: Dahlia summons a wave of healing water, creating a field that continuously heals allies and deals Hydro DMG to enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Tide of Renewal
Summons a wave of healing water, creating a field that continuously heals allies and deals Hydro DMG to enemies inside. Healing scales with Dahlia's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Soothing Waters
passive_talents.desc: After using Aqua Restoration, Dahlia's Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Blessing
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Tide of Renewal's field gain 20% increased Hydro DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Graceful Hostess
passive_talents.desc: When Dahlia is in the party, cooking a perfect dish has a 12% chance to double the product.

constellations.name: Healing Cascade
constellations.desc: Aqua Restoration gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Tide's Embrace
constellations.desc: Allies healed by Dahlia gain 20% increased ATK for 8s.

constellations.name: Ocean's Gift
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Aqua Restoration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Restorative Flow
constellations.desc: Allies inside Tide of Renewal's field gain 20% increased Healing Bonus.

constellations.name: Blessed Tides
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Tide of Renewal by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fontaine's Grace
constellations.desc: When an ally is healed by Dahlia, they gain 20% increased Energy Recharge for 8s.

dehya.description: A fierce Eremite warrior from Sumeru, Dehya uses her claymore and Pyro vision to protect her allies and deal powerful AoE damage.
dehya.info: Dehya is a Pyro claymore DPS and tank who excels at providing interruption resistance and AoE Pyro damage. Build her for HP%, CRIT, and Pyro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Molten Inferno
skills.desc: Dehya creates a Fiery Sanctum field, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and providing interruption resistance to allies inside.
skills.details_html:
Molten Inferno
Creates a Fiery Sanctum field, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and providing interruption resistance to allies inside. Field duration and DMG scale with Dehya's Max HP.

skills.name: Leonine Bite
skills.desc: Dehya unleashes a powerful Pyro attack, dealing massive AoE Pyro DMG and increasing her resistance to interruption.
skills.details_html:
Leonine Bite
Unleashes a powerful Pyro attack, dealing massive AoE Pyro DMG and increasing Dehya's resistance to interruption. DMG scales with Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Unstinting Succor
passive_talents.desc: Within the Fiery Sanctum field, Dehya's interruption resistance is increased by 30%.

passive_talents.name: Stalwart and True
passive_talents.desc: After using Leonine Bite, Dehya's ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Gold-Dusted Tradition
passive_talents.desc: When Dehya is in the party, the chance to obtain double product when forging weapons is increased by 10%.

constellations.name: The Flame Incandescent
constellations.desc: Molten Inferno gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
constellations.desc: Allies inside Fiery Sanctum gain 20% increased ATK.

constellations.name: A Rage Swift as Fire
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Leonine Bite by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: An Oath Abiding
constellations.desc: After using Leonine Bite, Dehya's HP is restored by 20%.

constellations.name: The Alpha Unleashed
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Molten Inferno by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
constellations.desc: Dehya's Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 20% when inside Fiery Sanctum.

diluc.description: The owner of the Dawn Winery, Diluc is a powerful Pyro claymore user who excels at sustained Pyro DPS and strong single-target damage.
diluc.info: Diluc is a Pyro claymore DPS who excels at sustained Pyro damage and strong single-target attacks. Build him for CRIT, ATK%, and Pyro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.desc: Diluc performs up to 3 consecutive slashes, each dealing Pyro DMG in a line.
skills.details_html:
Searing Onslaught
Performs up to 3 consecutive slashes, each dealing Pyro DMG in a line. Each slash can be cast within a short time window.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.desc: Diluc releases intense flames to knock back enemies, then summons a Phoenix that deals massive Pyro DMG in its path and explodes at the end.
skills.details_html:
Dawn
Releases intense flames to knock back enemies, then summons a Phoenix that deals massive Pyro DMG in its path and explodes at the end. The Phoenix infuses Diluc's weapon with Pyro for a duration.

passive_talents.name: Relentless
passive_talents.desc: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passive_talents.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passive_talents.desc: The Pyro Enchantment provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer.

passive_talents.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passive_talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.desc: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5% for 10s. Can stack up to 3 times.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Searing Onslaught by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.desc: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm increases DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Dawn by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark
constellations.desc: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.

chevreuse.description: A disciplined officer from Fontaine, Chevreuse is a Pyro polearm user who provides shields and buffs to her team.
chevreuse.info: Chevreuse is a Pyro support who provides shields, buffs, and Pyro application. Build her for HP% and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Orderly Strike
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Crimson Command
skills.desc: Chevreuse commands her allies, granting a shield based on her Max HP and dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Crimson Command
Grants a shield based on Max HP and deals AoE Pyro DMG to nearby opponents.

skills.name: Shield of Justice
skills.desc: Chevreuse creates a field of justice, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and granting all allies increased resistance to interruption and ATK.
skills.details_html:
Shield of Justice
Creates a field that deals AoE Pyro DMG and grants all allies increased resistance to interruption and ATK. Field duration and bonus scale with Chevreuse's stats.

passive_talents.name: Disciplined Officer
passive_talents.desc: After using Crimson Command, Chevreuse's shield strength is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Pyro Tactics
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Shield of Justice's field gain increased Pyro DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Duty
passive_talents.desc: When Chevreuse is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: Commander's Resolve
constellations.desc: Crimson Command gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Shielded Advance
constellations.desc: Allies protected by Chevreuse's shield gain increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: Justice's Edge
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Crimson Command by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unyielding Spirit
constellations.desc: Allies inside Shield of Justice's field gain increased Healing Bonus.

constellations.name: Pyro's Blessing
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Shield of Justice by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: True Justice
constellations.desc: When an ally is shielded by Chevreuse and takes damage, they gain increased ATK for 8s.
